title: FIWARE - Open311 Service Request
description: An entity of type ServiceRequest is an acceptable Open 311 service request. Such entity encompasses all the properties defined by Open 311 at POST Service Request and GET Service Request.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be Open311ServiceRequest

service_request_id.description: Property. The unique ID of the service request created.

jurisdiction_id.description: Property. The unique ID of the legal entity of the service (i.e. city).

service_code.description: Property. The unique identifier for the service request type.

service_name.description: Property. The human readable name of the service request type.

agency_responsible.description: Property. Please note that this is semantically equivalent to the provider property (name subproperty) of schema.org. Model:'http://schema.org/provider'

service_notice.description: Property. Information about the action expected to fulfill the request or otherwise address the information reported.

status.description: Property. Allows one to search for requests which have a specific status. This defaults to all statuses; can be declared multiple times, comma delimited. Enum:'open, closed'

status_notes.description: Property. Explanation of why status was changed to current state or more details on current status than conveyed with status alone.

requested_datetime.description: Property. The date and time when the service request was made. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'

updated_datetime.description: Property. The date and time when the service request was last modified. For requests with status=closed, this will be the date the request was closed. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'

expected_datetime.description: Property. The date and time when the service request can be expected to be fulfilled. This may be based on a service-specific service level agreement. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'

media_url.description: Property. A URL to media associated with the request, eg an image. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'

requested_datetime.description: Property. The date and time when the service request was made. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

device_id.description: Relationship. The unique device ID of the device submitting the request. This is usually only used for mobile devices. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

account_id.description: Relationship. The unique ID for the user account of the person submitting the request. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'
